title: Termination of U.S. Hunger Survey (USDA), 2025
mechanism: Federal decision to cancel the annual survey, label it ‘redundant, politicized, costly’ and discontinue its reporting
impact: Blind spot on national hunger trends, inability for researchers and advocates to track food insecurity over time, suppression of accountability data.
sources: AP News: After cuts to food stamps, Trump administration ends government's annual report on hunger
USDA press release: USDA Terminates Redundant Food Insecurity Survey
Reuters: Impact of Trump cuts will be harder to track without USDA hunger survey
